TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventHandler(object sender, DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataGridViewCellStateChangedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El evento tiene lugar cuando cambia de estado de una celda, como cuando la celda pierde o adquiere foco.The event occurs when a cell state changes, such as when the cell loses or gains focus. Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
